427650.name: Aviary Attorney Soundtrack
427650.description:
The Aviary Attorney soundtrack provides all of the game's music in cleanly-edited 320kbps MP3 format. 31 music tracks cover the entire span of the romantic era of music, from Hector Berlioz to Claude Debussy.

Track list:

1 - Introduction
2 - Murder
3 - Aviary Office
4 - Caterline Demiaou
5 - Kangaroos
6 - Baron Rorgueil
7 - Antics
8 - Juste Volerti
9 - Trial Opening
10 - Trial Cross-Examination
11 - Trial Turnabout
12 - Victory
13 - Quanelle's Tavern
14 - Card break
15 - Prince Juan
16 - Cygne
17 - Severin Cocorico
18 - Lander Hagelslak
19 - Wolves
20 - Renard Vulpes
21 - King Louis-Philippe
22 - Aquarium
23 - July Revolution
24 - Cathedral
25 - Etude
26 - Ghouls
27 - Prelude
28 - Catacombs
29 - February Revolution
30 - Suite Gothique
31 - End Credits
